title: How to Get Rock Smash on Pok√©mon FireRed

steps.title: Go to One Island.
steps.content: Go to One Island. One Island only unlocks once you defeat the Cinnabar Island gym. You can get to the island by boarding a ship.

steps.title: Go to the east end of the island on Kindle Road.
steps.content: Go to the east end of the island on Kindle Road.

steps.title: Surf north to the sandy beach.
steps.content: Surf north to the sandy beach. Continue heading north through the tall grass to another sandy area. Keep walking north until you see a cave opening.

steps.title: Enter the cave.
steps.content: Enter the cave. You'll see "Ember Spa" in the upper left corner of your screen. Follow the path north, then climb a set of stairs, then head east to a man between two waterfalls.

steps.title: Talk to the man.
steps.content: Talk to the man. He'll give you HM06, Rock Smash . Rock Smash will smash small crumbling boulders in your way.
